{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated \$52.1M in 2020-2021 on contracts with ESBE SCIENTIFIC INDUSTRIES.
{{< /entity_summary >}}

{{< details summary="See original contracts and amendments" panel_body_class="vendor-names-list" >}}
- [ESBE SCIENTIFIC INDUSTRIES INC.](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22ESBE%20SCIENTIFIC%20INDUSTRIES%20INC.%22)
- [ESBE SCIENTIFIC INDUSTRIES INC](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22ESBE%20SCIENTIFIC%20INDUSTRIES%20INC%22)
- [ESBE Scientific Industries Inc.](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22ESBE%20Scientific%20Industries%20Inc.%22)
{{< /details >}}
